ghost

Class Chaser

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.GameObject
      • ghost.Movable
        • ghost.Ghost
          • ghost.Chaser

  • public class Chaser
extends Ghost
    A type of ghost which directly targets and chases Waka. Its corner is the top left corner.

      • generateVectors

        public int[] generateVectors(int targetx,
                             int targety)
        Generates the vector for which the chaser attacks. Directly targets waka.
        Specified by:
        generateVectors in class Ghost
        Parameters:
        targetx - The x coordinate of the target location
        targety - The y coordinagte of the target location
        Returns:
        An array of two integers which is the intended direction of travel for this ghost type.

      • hasWhim

        public boolean hasWhim()
        Gets the status of if the chaser has a paired whim.
        Returns:
        True if the chaser is paired with a whim, false if it is not.
